attributes.action: Reduce the tax by 50p per litre on fuel
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Reduce the tax by 50p per litre on fuel and allow the people of this country the chance to earn a living without being taken for a ride in this unjust tax. without the poeple working the govenment would not be able to carry on. every tax increase on fuel is driving more and more poeple to give up work.
